name: Solootbox DAO
description:
Solootbox is a rewards-driven DAO that utilizes monthly NFT Generations to crowdfund the Treasury while rewarding the top blue-chip Solana NFT’s to holders. The NFT Generations are staked to earn BOX; the Solootbox DAO governance token.
Solootbox DAO is built by the Solana NFT community for the Solana NFT Community. That is why 10% (100 million) of the total BOX supply is allocated to members of the Solana ecosystem based on Magic Eden activity.
